page.title: 15Wimbledon Tennis.
page.content: Although Wimbledon is not in our area, its proximity means that pupils from local schools are chosen to act as ball boys and girls. Here is part of an interview with a ball girl;- 'How were you selected?' 'Firstly by the P.E. teacher;there were 60 of us, but after the training sessions it was cut to 18' 'Describe a typical day.' 'we are collected at 10.3a.m.We go on court at midday and apart from tea, can be there until 8.30p.m.' 'What is your particular job?' 'Captain.I check the court for times and see the team of ball girls for whom I am responsible arrive on time. Ihave to change the scoreboard.' 'What do you wear?' 'Green skirt, purple and green shirt and trainers,tracksuittop and socks'.
